name: You can apply for a conditional order (JOINT AND SOLE)
body:
Case number: ((reference number))

Dear ((first name)) ((last name)),

You can now continue to the next stage of your ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership)), and apply for a ‘conditional order’. A conditional order is a document that says the court does not see any reason why you cannot ((isDivorce??get a divorce))((isDissolution??end your civil partnership)).

You can apply for a conditional order here: ((signin url))

((husbandJoint??Your husband has also received this notification.))((wifeJoint??Your wife has also received this notification.))((civilPartnerJoint??Your civil partner has also received this notification.))((joint conditional order?? They need to apply for a conditional order too because this is a joint application.))

Divorce and Dissolution 
HM Courts & Tribunals Service 
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm) 

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email.
